籤詩版本二:
Mzere wagolide umayesa mtima wanu, palibe kuchepa, palibe kuwonjezeka, palibe kulemera
Ali ndi mtima wowongoka m’moyo wake wonse, ndipo nkhani zake zonse n’zowala ndipo luso lake n’lowala. Bei ili ndi zida.
詩意:
Hexagram iyi imayimira mtima wodekha komanso wowongoka.
Zonse ndi zokhazikika komanso zopanda ngozi.
解曰: Mtendere wamalingaliro ndi umphumphu. Pamapeto pake, mtendere ndi bata. Ingotsatirani ntchito yanu. Dziko lili pamtendere.
籤詩故事一:
◇Jinjing amayesa Douer
Dou Yanshan adachita zabwino ndikudziunjikira ukoma, ndipo adabereka ana aamuna asanu, omwe adapambana. Mulungu ankafuna kuyesa mmodzi wa ana ake aamuna, Dou Yi, ndipo anatumiza mzimu wa golide wooneka ngati mtsikana kuti unyenge Dou Yi, koma Dou Yi sanagwedezeke. pansi napeza golidi wagolide.
(Nkhani iyi ndi fanizo la malingaliro a Dou Yi, osati kuyesa kugonana.)
聖意: Pabanja → Osadziteteza → Muzifuna chuma → Muzichita zinthu mwanzeru → Ukwati wokhazikika → Phatikizani Liujia → Amuna oyenda pansi → Khalani ndi nyongolotsi zamtundu wa Shintian → Ziweto zokhazikika → Pezani anthu mwamtendere → Chepetsani milandu → Kusamuka mwamtendere → Sungani katundu wotayika → Onani matenda → Onani matenda → → chopanda
第X籤: Chizindikiro makumi asanu ndi limodzi mphambu zisanu ndi ziwiri
